body:
btmp is null. There is no way that by using the attached code.Then, the value of btmp would be anything. But it's null!

If you want to clone Bitmap the use create method or any other of that sort.

`Bitmap btmp = Bitmap.create(drawable.getBitmap());`

issue.title: recycle throws null ref exception on detached from window
issue.body:
https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/issues/586

After upgrading Lottie Packages from 2.2.7 to 2.3.2, I am now experiencing what looks to be the same issue with the lack of null check logic in the recycle function resulting in an exception for Android only, iOS is fine. 

Does someone need to migrate the change made to fix the above link to lottie-react-native?

Below is a screenshot of the issue:
![recycleexception](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32200937/36907029-185b6b76-1dfd-11e8-8f5c-a11825caa41a.png)

issue.title: java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void android.graphics.Bitmap.recycle()' on a null object reference
